resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102928</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102928</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085965</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Comics in the classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Comics im Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bandes dessinées dans la salle de classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comics na sala de aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comics nell'aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Comics στην τάξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tebeos en la sala de clase</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Graphic novels aren't just "literature lite": they're a genre you can use to explore philosophy, history, human interactions, visual literacy, and more with soon-to-be adults in a high school English class.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graphische Romane sind nicht gerechtes "Literatur 
lite": sie sind ein Genre, das Sie benutzen können, um 
Philosophie zu erforschen, Geschichte, menschliche Interaktionen, 
Sichtbildungsgrad, und mehr mit bald-zu-sind Erwachsene in einer High 
School englischen Kategorie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les romans graphiques ne sont pas "lite de 
littérature" simplement : ils sont un genre que vous pouvez 
employer pour explorer la philosophie, histoire, interactions 
humaines, instruction visuelle, et plus avec bientôt-à-sont des 
adultes dans une classe anglaise de lycée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As novelas gráficas não são da "lite justo 
literatura": são um genre que você pode se usar explorar a 
filosofia, history, interações humanas, literacy visual, e mais com 
logo-à-estão adultos em uma classe inglesa de High School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I romanzi grafici non sono "lite della 
letteratura" giusto: sono un genere che potete usare per 
esplorare la filosofia, storia, interazioni umane, literacy visivo e 
più con presto-$$$-SONO adulti in un codice categoria inglese della 
High School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα γραφικά μυθιστορήματα είναι όχι μόνο "λογοτεχνία 
lite": είναι ένα ύφος που μπορείτε να χρησιμοποιήσετε 
για να ερευνήσετε τη φιλοσοφία, ιστορία, ανθρώπινες 
αλληλεπιδράσεις, οπτική βασική εκπαίδευση, και περισσότεροι με 
σύντομα-$$$-ΕΊΝΑΙ ενήλικοι σε μια αγγλική κλάση γυμνασίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las novelas gráficas no son "lite justo de la 
literatura": son un género que usted puede utilizar para 
explorar la filosofía, historia, interacciones humanas, instrucción 
visual, y más con pronto-a-son adultos en una clase inglesa de la 
High School secundaria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ROSS WHITE
FN:ROSS WHITE
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085965</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102928</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/comics-in-the-classroom</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
